title:
Kuzey Amerika'daki En Eksiksiz Mamut Fosili Kanada'da Bulundu!
              #shorts
description: EN YA\xc5\x9eLI BEBEKLER\xc4\xb0N EN YEN\xc4\xb0S\xc4\xb0: KANADA\xe2\x80\x99DA 30.000 YILLIK BOZULMAMI\xc5\x9e KILLI B\xc4\xb0R YAVRU MAMUT KE\xc5\x9eFED\xc4\xb0LD\xc4\xb0\\nKanada\xe2\x80\x99n\xc4\xb1n Yukon b\xc3\xb6lgesindeki bir alt\xc4\xb1n madeninde, do\xc4\x9fal ko\xc5\x9fullarda mumyalanm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f h\xc3\xa2lde k\xc4\xb1ll\xc4\xb1 bir yavru mamut bulundu. Bir hafta \xc3\xb6nce donmu\xc5\x9f toprak \xc3\xbczerinde yap\xc4\xb1lan maden kaz\xc4\xb1lar\xc4\xb1 esnas\xc4\xb1nda ke\xc5\x9ffedilen mamut neredeyse m\xc3\xbckemmel bir \xc5\x9fekilde korunmu\xc5\x9f durumdayd\xc4\xb1.\\nYerel halk taraf\xc4\xb1ndan mamuta \xe2\x80\x9cB\xc3\xbcy\xc3\xbck Bebek Hayvan\xe2\x80\x9d anlam\xc4\xb1na gelen \\"Nun cho ga\\" ismi verildi. Paleontologlar, ilk \xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1kar\xc4\xb1mlara dayanarak Nun cho ga\xe2\x80\x99n\xc4\xb1n yakla\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1k 30.000 y\xc4\xb1l \xc3\xb6nce \xc3\xb6ld\xc3\xbc\xc4\x9f\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbc ve buz devrinde donmu\xc5\x9f toprakta korundu\xc4\x9funu tahmin ederken \xc3\xb6ld\xc3\xbc\xc4\x9f\xc3\xbcnde 30-35 g\xc3\xbcnl\xc3\xbck oldu\xc4\x9funu d\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9f\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbcyor.\\nYavru mamutun son anlar\xc4\xb1nda otland\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 tahmin edilen Yukon b\xc3\xb6lgesi, buz devrinden kalma fosilleriyle me\xc5\x9fhur bir b\xc3\xb6lge olsa da k\xc4\xb1l ve derileri bozulmam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f mumyalar\xc4\xb1n bulunmas\xc4\xb1 olduk\xc3\xa7a nadir g\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbclen bir durumdur. 2007 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Sibirya\xe2\x80\x99da ke\xc5\x9ffedilen yavru mamut Lyuba ile benzer b\xc3\xbcy\xc3\xbckl\xc3\xbckte oldu\xc4\x9fu a\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1klanan k\xc4\xb1ll\xc4\xb1 yavru mamut, Kuzey Amerika\xe2\x80\x99da ke\xc5\x9ffedilmi\xc5\x9f en eksiksiz mamut olmas\xc4\xb1yla da b\xc3\xbcy\xc3\xbck \xc3\xb6nem ta\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1yor. Dolay\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1yla elde edilecek DNA \xc3\xb6rnekleri mamutlar\xc4\xb1n nas\xc4\xb1l t\xc3\xbckendi\xc4\x9fine dair ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalara \xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1k tutaca\xc4\x9fa benziyor.\\nKaynak\\nhttps://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/jun/26/gold-miner-in-canada-finds-mummified-35000-year-old-woolly-mammoth\\nhttps://yukon.ca/en/news/mummified-baby-woolly-mammoth-found-gold-miner-klondike\\nhttps://arkeofili.com/kanadadaki-madenciler-mumyalanmis-yunlu-mamut-buldu/\\n\\n#bilim #shorts  #fosil \\n\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba Gelecek Bilimde kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda, bilimin her alan\xc4\xb1ndan \xc3\xb6zg\xc3\xbcn canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1nlar bulabilirsiniz. \\nFizikten biyolojiye, yapay zekadan psikolojiye, m\xc3\xbczik analizinden astronomiye, satran\xc3\xa7tan teknoloji haberlerine kadar bir\xc3\xa7ok i\xc3\xa7eri\xc4\x9fi her g\xc3\xbcn ka\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1rmamak i\xc3\xa7in kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za abone olun! description: Want to learn the answers to 10 migraine questions? Each question was answered within 2-minutes, without scientific terms. That is our new concept 2-minute challenge. \\n\\nIs a migraine more than a headache? \\n\\nWatch our newest episode with world-famous Prof. Antoinette Maassen van den Brink to find out!\\n\\nAbout us: https://bit.ly/fiits\\n---\\nFuture is in the Science, is a science communication platform. We aim to build a bridge between society and science.\\n\\nTogether with 50+ volunteers, we work relentlessly to promote critical thinking and teach about science. Contrary to conventional popular science platforms, we are a new-generation platform making; live streams on Twitch, interviews, educational content, interactive services, and social responsibility projects.\\n#2minchallange #migraine #science\\n\\n0:00 Introduction\\n4:05 What is migraine? title: Elektron Mikroskobu (SEM-TEM) @Psi Bilim
description: Bu yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda ODT\xc3\x9c\'den Sedat Canl\xc4\xb1 hocam\xc4\xb1zla  beraber Elektron misroskoplar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 inceledik. SEM-TEM elektron mikroskoplar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fma prensipleri ve bir malzeme hakk\xc4\xb1nda bize neler \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9fretebilece\xc4\x9fini konu\xc5\x9ftuk. Hatta yay\xc4\xb1nda canl\xc4\xb1 olarak SEM  alt\xc4\xb1nda bir sa\xc3\xa7 telinin ve de 10 kuru\xc5\x9f madeni paran\xc4\xb1n nas\xc4\xb1l g\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbcnt\xc3\xbclendi\xc4\x9fine \xc5\x9fahit olduk. Biz b\xc3\xbcy\xc3\xbck merak ve heyecan duyduk. Siz de bu heyecan\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za \xc5\x9fahit olun. \xc4\xb0yi seyirler.\\n\\n#SEM #TEM #ElectronMicroscopy\\n\\n\xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler\\n00:00 Giri\xc5\x9f \\n00:30 Sedat Canl\xc4\xb1 Kimdir?\\n05:00 G\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbcr \xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1k mikroskobu\\n09:25 Elektron mikroskobu (TEM(Transmission electron microscopy))\\n17:25 SEM (Scanning Electron Microscope)\\n19:40 Malzeme Elektron Etkile\xc5\x9fimi\\n1:08:00 Elektron mikroskobu alt\xc4\xb1nda malzeme incelemeleri\\n1:09:00 SEM Sa\xc3\xa7 teli g\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbcnt\xc3\xbcleme\\n1:20:40 SEM 10 kuru\xc5\x9f g\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbcnt\xc3\xbcleme\\n1:26:40 Enerji Da\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1ml\xc4\xb1 X-I\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 Spektroskopisi (Energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy)\\n1:37:10 Scanning transmission electron microscopy(STEM)\\n1:38:00 Soru-Cevap\\n2:05:50 Kapan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba Gelecek Bilimde kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda, bilimin her alan\xc4\xb1ndan \xc3\xb6zg\xc3\xbcn canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1nlar bulabilirsiniz. \\nFizikten biyolojiye, yapay zekadan psikolojiye, m\xc3\xbczik analizinden astronomiye, satran\xc3\xa7tan teknoloji haberlerine kadar bir \xc3\xa7ok i\xc3\xa7eri\xc4\x9fi her g\xc3\xbcn ka\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1rmamak i\xc3\xa7in kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za abone olun! title: 2021 Nobel Fizik Ödülleri @Psi Bilim
description: 2021 #Nobel \xc3\xb6d\xc3\xbclleri verildi.2021 Nobel Fizik \xc3\xb6d\xc3\xbcl\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbcn yar\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1 atomik d\xc3\xbczeyden gezegen sistemlerine kadar kompleks fiziksel sistemlerinin anla\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1lmas\xc4\xb1 ve modellenmesi konusunda \xc3\xb6nemli \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar\xc4\xb1ndan dolay\xc4\xb1 Giorgio Parisi\'ye di\xc4\x9fer yar\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1 ise iklim de\xc4\x9fi\xc5\x9fikli\xc4\x9finin g\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbczde kullan\xc4\xb1lan modeli \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar\xc4\xb1ndan \xc3\xb6t\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbc Syukuro Manabe ve Klaus Hasselmann\'a verilmistir. \xc4\xb0yi seyirler.\\n\\n#nobel\xc3\xb6d\xc3\xbclleri #nobelfizik\xc3\xb6d\xc3\xbcl\xc3\xbc\\n\\n00:00 Giri\xc5\x9f\\n02:00 Nobel \xc3\xb6d\xc3\xbclleri hakk\xc4\xb1nda\\n14:00 Kompleks sistemler ve nobel \xc3\xb6d\xc3\xbcl\xc3\xbc\\n1:16:30 Kapan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba Gelecek Bilimde kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda, bilimin her alan\xc4\xb1ndan \xc3\xb6zg\xc3\xbcn canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1nlar bulabilirsiniz. \\nFizikten biyolojiye, yapay zekadan psikolojiye, m\xc3\xbczik analizinden astronomiye, satran\xc3\xa7tan teknoloji haberlerine kadar bir \xc3\xa7ok i\xc3\xa7eri\xc4\x9fi her g\xc3\xbcn ka\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1rmamak i\xc3\xa7in kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za abone olun! title:

description: \\"Psikolog G\xc3\xb6z\xc3\xbcyle\\" serimizin 3. b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcnde kurucumuz Cevdet Acarsoy sizden gelen sorular\xc4\xb1 psikolog g\xc3\xb6z\xc3\xbcyle cevapl\xc4\xb1yor.\\n\\n\xc3\x96NEML\xc4\xb0 NOT: Bu yay\xc4\xb1ndaki yorumlar bilgi verme ama\xc3\xa7l\xc4\xb1 olup, s\xc3\xb6z konusu incelenen i\xc3\xa7erikteki olay ve ki\xc5\x9filerle ilgili psikolojik te\xc5\x9fhis ya da tedavi \xc3\xb6nerisi i\xc3\xa7ermemektedir. title: Mental Well-being in Workplace // Dr. Isabelle van der Velpen
description: Are you feeling stressed, burned out, anxious or depressed at work or school? Keep an eye out for mental health problems that workplace or study environment can bring. \\n\\nIn this live stream we are talking about mental well-being in workplace and study environments with Isabelle van der Velpen MD from Erasmus University Medical Center. \\n\\n0:00:00 Intro\\n0:06:35 Isabelle van der Helpen\'s background\\n0:10:11 Seminar\'s focus and outline\\n0:12:10 Menti quiz\\n0:18:54 What is mental wellbeing?\\n0:26:22 Mental wellbeing and the pandemic\\n0:27:35 Mental wellbeing before the pandemic\\n0:28:13 Mental wellbeing in academia and workplace\\n0:35:42 How do check your mental wellbeing?\\n0:46:23 Stress symptoms\\n0:51:01 Anxiety symptoms\\n0:55:56 Low mood and depression\\n0:58:58 Checking physical symptoms\\n1:00:37 Check in with yourself\\n1:01:33 What can we do about mental wellbeing?\\n1:10:21 What can you start doing?\\n1:33:43 Challenge\\n1:36:51 Resources\\n1:37:00 Viewer questions and outro\\n\\n\\nCredits:\\nHost \xe2\x96\xbaCevdet Acarsoy\\nLive stream director \xe2\x96\xbaGamze \xc5\x9eahman\\nSocial Media  \xe2\x96\xba Mert \xc3\x87\xc4\xb1kla and the team\\n\\n#wellbeing #workplace #psychology\\n\xe2\x96\xba On our Future Science channel, you can find original live broadcasts from all fields of science.\\nSubscribe to our channel to not miss a lot of content from physics to biology, from artificial intelligence to psychology, from music analysis to astronomy, from chess to technology news.!  \\n\xe2\x96\xba  https://youtube.com/gelecekbilimde?sub_confirmation=1\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba To support us: https://youtube.com/gelecekbilimde/join\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba To watch our broadcasts:\\nYouTube Kanal\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba https://youtube.com/gelecekbilimde\\nTwitch Kanal\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba https://twitch.tv/gelecekbilimde\\nPodcast \xe2\x96\xba https://podcast.gelecekbilimde.net\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba Follow us!\\nTwitter \xe2\x96\xba https://twitter.com/gelecekbilimde\\nInstagram \xe2\x96\xba https://instagram.com/gelecekbilimde\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba Our Other Links:\\nTo join us\xe2\x96\xba https://birlikte.gelecekbilimde.net\\nReferences \xe2\x96\xba https://bit.ly/gb-kaynak\\nEnglish words \xe2\x96\xba https://quizlet.com/Gelecek_Bilimde\\nDiscord \xe2\x96\xba https://discord.gelecekbilimde.net\\nGoodreads\xe2\x96\xba https://goodreads.com/gelecekbilimde"

B\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9fra Resulo\xc4\x9flu\'nun bu haftaki konu\xc4\x9fu Avukat \xc5\x9eebnem Ahi bizlere dijital ortamlarda u\xc4\x9frad\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z \xc5\x9fiddet ve bununla hukuki olarak m\xc3\xbccadele etmek i\xc3\xa7in yapabileceklerimiz hakk\xc4\xb1nda bilgilerini aktaracak. title: Working From Home During Crisis 10 Science Based Tips
keywords: working from home with a baby
working from home as a teenager
description: Staying at and working from home could be challenging in terms of mental health. Psychologist Cevdet Acarsoy, shares 10 science based tips for staying healthy. \\n\\n---\\nGelecek Bilimde (Future is Science), is a science communication platform. We aim to build a bridge between the society and science.\\n\\nTogether with 40+ volunteers, we work relentlessly to promote critical thinking and teach about science. description: #Covid19 crisis has added extra #stress and uncertainty about future to every individual throughout the world.\\nWe will focus on different #techniques that each of us can use in their everyday life to deal with the different situations, feelings, roles and tasks that we were placed to fulfill during this ongoing crisis. title: How your Brain actually works? // Neuroscience 101
keywords: how brain works in human body
how your brain works and changes
how the brain works crash course
how human brain works in english
description: In order to carry out science communication on an international scale,  we will now also produce videos in English. Here we are with the second video of our collaboration with the Brainstorm YouTube channel (Neuroscientist Philip Brandner). Don\'t forget to subscribe to Philip\'s channel too!\\n\\nhttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4hzKX9sacnKW4jRVzR8QmA\\n\\nHow does your Brain actually work? What are brains for? What is their purpose?\\n\\nFor a long time, neuroscience wasn\'t able to answer this question at all. But in the last few decades, some amazing new insights might finally reveal what all of our brains are actually doing most of the time.\\n\\nIn this video, I will dive deep into the amazing new world of your brain and modern neuroscience. \\n\\n\\nFollow me on Instagram: https://instagram.com/this_is_brainstorm?utm_medium=copy_link\\nand Twitter: https://twitter.com/philipbrandner\\n\\nVideo Translator: Meryem Yap\xc4\xb1c\xc4\xb1\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xbaContents\\n0:00  Introduction\\n0:34  Examples of video content.\\n1:44  What happens when the predictions don\'t come true?\\n2:34  If the brain can\'t find answers to questions?\\n3:11  Making a prediction\\n3:38  How does the guessing machine brain work?\\n5:51 The importance of the structure of brain\\n8:27 The importance of forecasting\\n9:16 End\\n\\nReferences\\n\\nGreat book of predictions and emotions:\\nLisa Feldman-Barrett: How Emotions are Made.\\n\\nAn academic primer on prediction \\u0026 cognitive science:\\nClark (2013)  Predictive brains, situated agents, and the future of cognitive science.\\n\\nTechnical paper on auditory predictions:\\nChennu et al. (2013): Expectation and attention in hierarchical auditory networks.\\n\\nTechnical paper on visual processing:\\nSillito \\u0026 Jones (2002): Corticothalamic interactions in the transfer of visual information.\\n\\nPredictions and Autism:\\nPellicano et al. (2012): When the world becomes too real.\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba On our Future Science channel, you can find original live broadcasts from all fields of science.\\nSubscribe to our channel to not miss a lot of content from physics to biology, from artificial intelligence to psychology, from music analysis to astronomy, from chess to technology news.!  \\n\xe2\x96\xba  https://youtube.com/gelecekbilimde?sub_confirmation=1\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba To support us: https://youtube.com/gelecekbilimde/join\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba To watch our broadcasts:\\nYouTube Kanal\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba https://youtube.com/gelecekbilimde\\nTwitch Kanal\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba https://twitch.tv/gelecekbilimde\\nPodcast \xe2\x96\xba https://podcast.gelecekbilimde.net\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba Follow us!\\nTwitter \xe2\x96\xba https://twitter.com/gelecekbilimde\\nInstagram \xe2\x96\xba https://instagram.com/gelecekbilimde\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba Our Other Links:\\nTo join us\xe2\x96\xba https://birlikte.gelecekbilimde.net\\nReferences \xe2\x96\xba https://bit.ly/gb-kaynak\\nEnglish words \xe2\x96\xba https://quizlet.com/Gelecek_Bilimde\\nDiscord \xe2\x96\xba https://discord.gelecekbilimde.net\\nGoodreads\xe2\x96\xba https://goodreads.com/gelecekbilimde"

title: Pratik Hukuk | Av. Emrah Altunoğlu //Herkes İçin Hukuk
description: Gelecek Bilimde olarak yepyeni bir yay\xc4\xb1n serisiyle kar\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1zday\xc4\xb1z.\\nHerkes \xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7in Hukuk yay\xc4\xb1n serimizde birbirinden k\xc4\xb1ymetli avukat konuklar\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z, g\xc3\xbcnl\xc3\xbck hayatta kar\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1la\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z hukuki sorunlar hakk\xc4\xb1nda moderat\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcz Av. B\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9fra Resulo\xc4\x9flu\'nun e\xc5\x9fli\xc4\x9finde bizleri bilgilendirecekler. \\n\\nBa\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za gelen olaylarda hak kayb\xc4\xb1na u\xc4\x9framamak i\xc3\xa7in vatanda\xc5\x9f olarak ilk etapta yapmam\xc4\xb1z gerekenleri \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenmek isterseniz 18 May\xc4\xb1s 2021 Sal\xc4\xb1 saat 21.00\'dan itibaren iki haftada bir Sal\xc4\xb1 ak\xc5\x9famlar\xc4\xb1 kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za bekliyoruz. Bu b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbczde Av. Emrah Altuno\xc4\x9flu bizlere temel hukuki kavramlar\xc4\xb1, uyu\xc5\x9fmazl\xc4\xb1klarda kullan\xc4\xb1lan alternatif \xc3\xa7\xc3\xb6z\xc3\xbcm yollar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1, k\xc4\xb1saca bu seride bizlere \xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1k tutacak temel metotlar\xc4\xb1 anlatacak.\\n\\nNot: Herkes \xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7in Hukuk serisi bir hukuki dan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmanl\xc4\xb1k hizmeti de\xc4\x9fildir. Her olay kendine \xc3\xb6zg\xc3\xbcd\xc3\xbcr. Kar\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1la\xc5\x9fm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f oldu\xc4\x9funuz hukuki problemleriniz i\xc3\xa7in ba\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1za gelen olaylar\xc4\xb1 a\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1k ve detayl\xc4\xb1ca konu\xc5\x9faca\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1z bir avukata ba\xc5\x9fvurmal\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1z.\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xbaKonu\xc4\x9fumuz Av. Emrah Altuno\xc4\x9flu kimdir?\\nAv. Emrah Altuno\xc4\x9flu, 1983 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Kayseri\xe2\x80\x99de do\xc4\x9fdu. 2006 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Marmara \xc3\x9cniversitesi Hukuk Fak\xc3\xbcltesi\'nden mezun oldu. 2008 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1ndan itibaren Ankara\xe2\x80\x99da fiilen avukatl\xc4\xb1k y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbctmektedir. \xc3\x87HD ve TOG gibi hak temelli yap\xc4\xb1larda uzun y\xc4\xb1llar \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbctt\xc3\xbckten sonra, Avukat Haklar\xc4\xb1 Grubu Ankara grubunun kurulmas\xc4\xb1nda emek vermi\xc5\x9f halen bu yap\xc4\xb1yla hukukun bir\xc3\xa7ok alan\xc4\xb1nda raporlamalar yapmakta, \xc3\xa7e\xc5\x9fitli projelerin koordinat\xc3\xb6rl\xc3\xbc\xc4\x9f\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbc y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbctmektedir. Ge\xc3\xa7mi\xc5\x9f d\xc3\xb6nemde Ulusal ve Uluslararas\xc4\xb1 Hukuk Kurultaylar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n (2017) \xc3\xa7e\xc5\x9fitli koordinat\xc3\xb6rl\xc3\xbcklerini \xc3\xbcstlenmi\xc5\x9f, yine yerel d\xc3\xbczeyde Ankara ve \xc4\xb0stanbul\xe2\x80\x99da onlarca hak temelli projenin emek\xc3\xa7isi olmu\xc5\x9ftur. title: Cultures of the World // Talk with @Ayhan Sicimoğlu
keywords: video on cultures of the world
description: Gelecek Bilimde (Future is Science), is a science communication platform. We aim to build a bridge between the society and science.\\n\\nTogether with 40+ volunteers, we work relentlessly to promote critical thinking and teach about science. Contrary to conventional popular science platforms, we are a new-generation platform making; live streams on Twitch, interviews, educational content, interactive services and social responsibility projects.\\n\\nIn this episode we are talking about cultural differences and similarities around the world with renowned travel show tv host, gourmet and musician Ayhan Sicimo\xc4\x9flu.\\n\\n#ayhansicimoglu #culture #travel #science\\n\\nMoments\\n\\n00:00:00 Hello!\\n00:02:06 Who is Ayhan Sicimo\xc4\x9flu?\\n00:05:22 Turkish-Greek Kitchen\\n00:07:41 TV Shows of Ayhan Sicimo\xc4\x9flu\\n00:09:40 Viewer comments\\n00:10:26 About race, people and cultures\\n00:16:57 Noah\'s Flood (book)\\n00:18:12 TINA (Turkish Foundation for Underwater Archaeology)\\n00:28:03 Ayhan Sicimo\xc4\x9flu interview about Mustafa Ko\xc3\xa7 and TINA\\n00:31:45 Importance and history of Asia Minor\\n00:33:44 Similarities and differences between cultures\\n00:47:20 Realistic Conflict Theory\\n00:50:55 Coming together for a common goal\\n00:52:02 On immigration and Syrian refugee crisis\\n00:59:30 About Mustafa Kemal Atat\xc3\xbcrk and Turkish War of Independence\\n01:02:17 Role of the media on international events\\n01:05:38 Wishes about the world\\n01:15:04 Power of social media\\n01:19:20 Viewer questions and outro\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba Gelecek Bilimde kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda, bilimin her alan\xc4\xb1ndan \xc3\xb6zg\xc3\xbcn canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1nlar bulabilirsiniz. \\nFizikten biyolojiye, yapay zekadan psikolojiye, m\xc3\xbczik analizinden astronomiye, satran\xc3\xa7tan teknoloji haberlerine kadar bir\xc3\xa7ok i\xc3\xa7eri\xc4\x9fi her g\xc3\xbcn ka\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1rmamak i\xc3\xa7in kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za abone olun! title: Bilimde Replikasyon Krizi: Coase Kuramı // Bilim Ahlakı S1B4
description: Bu yeni serimizde Dr. Altu\xc4\x9f Yal\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1nta\xc5\x9f ve Cevdet Acarsoy, keyifli sohbetleri i\xc3\xa7inde, \\"ahlaks\xc4\xb1z bilim olur mu?\\" sorusuna yan\xc4\xb1t ararken,  bilim insanlar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n yanl\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f ve \xc5\x9f\xc3\xbcpheli uygulamalar\xc4\xb1na \xc3\xb6rnekler veriyor. \\n\\n\xc3\x96zellikle be\xc5\x9feri bilimlerin ba\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1ndaki bir bela olan tekrarlama krizinden bahsedece\xc4\x9fiz. Bilimsel ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar\xc4\xb1n sonu\xc3\xa7lar\xc4\xb1 ba\xc5\x9fka ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar taraf\xc4\xb1ndan neden tekrarlanam\xc4\xb1yor? Ankara \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nden Do\xc3\xa7. title: 3D Biyobasım // Dr. Yavuz Nuri Ertaş
description: Dr. Yavuz Nuri Erta\xc5\x9f lisans e\xc4\x9fitimini Ba\xc5\x9fkent \xc3\x9cniversitesi Biyomedikal M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fi b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcnde tamamlamas\xc4\xb1 akabinde Bilkent \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde bulunan Ulusal Nanoteknoloji Ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma Merkezinde, Malzeme Bilimi ve Nanoteknoloji program\xc4\xb1nda y\xc3\xbcksek lisansa ba\xc5\x9flam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Burada mikro-nano fabrikasyon ve sens\xc3\xb6rler konular\xc4\xb1nda ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar yapt\xc4\xb1ktan sonra d\xc3\xbcnyan\xc4\xb1n en sayg\xc4\xb1n okullar\xc4\xb1ndan Kaliforniya \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde (UCLA) doktora e\xc4\x9fitimine ba\xc5\x9flayan Erta\xc5\x9f, manyetik nanopar\xc3\xa7ac\xc4\xb1klar\xc4\xb1n \xc3\xbcretimi  ve MR kontrast ajan\xc4\xb1 olarak uygulamalar\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xbczerine odaklanm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Bu \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar s\xc4\xb1ras\xc4\xb1nda d\xc3\xbcnyada bir ilk olan Gadolinium nanopar\xc3\xa7ac\xc4\xb1klar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n y\xc3\xbcksek safl\xc4\xb1kta \xc3\xbcretilebilece\xc4\x9fi bir nanofabrikasyon tekni\xc4\x9fi geli\xc5\x9ftirmi\xc5\x9ftir ve bu par\xc3\xa7ac\xc4\xb1klar\xc4\xb1n MR g\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbcnt\xc3\xbclemede y\xc3\xbcksek performans sergiledi\xc4\x9fini deneysel olarak g\xc3\xb6stermi\xc5\x9ftir. Doktora sonras\xc4\xb1 ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar\xc4\xb1na yine UCLA\'de devam edip \xc3\xbc\xc3\xa7 boyutlu biyobask\xc4\xb1 alan\xc4\xb1nda yay\xc4\xb1nlad\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 son makalesi alan\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n en iyi dergilerinden Advanced Healthcare Materials\xe2\x80\x99da kapak olarak yay\xc4\xb1nlanm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. T\xc3\x9cB\xc4\xb0TAK 2232 Uluslararas\xc4\xb1 Lider Ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmac\xc4\xb1lar Program\xc4\xb1 kapsam\xc4\xb1nda yurda kesin d\xc3\xb6n\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9f yapan Dr. Erta\xc5\x9f \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar\xc4\xb1na Erciyes \xc3\x9cniversitesi Nanoteknoloji Ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma Merkezi (ERNAM) ve Erciyes \xc3\x9cniversitesi Biyomedikal M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9finde devam etmektedir.\\n#biyoprinting #3D\\n\\n \xe2\x96\xba \xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler\\n00:00 - Giri\xc5\x9f\\n00:14 - A\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f \\n1:28 - Yavuz N. title: Okyanusun Altındakiler // Dr. Derya Akkaynak
description: \xe2\x96\xbaOkyanusun Alt\xc4\xb1ndakiler\\nD\xc3\xbcnya\'n\xc4\xb1n %75\'i sularla kapl\xc4\xb1. Peki biz bu denizler ve okyanuslar hakk\xc4\xb1nda neler biliyoruz? Neden detayl\xc4\xb1 bilgi sahibi de\xc4\x9filiz? Okyanuslar\xc4\xb1n ke\xc5\x9ffedilmemi\xc5\x9f yerlerinde neler var? Dr. Derya Akkaynak ile 25 Mart 2021 Per\xc5\x9fembe 21:00\'da yapaca\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z Okyanusun Alt\xc4\xb1ndakiler ve O\xc5\x9finografi konulu yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za hepinizi bekleriz.\\n \\n\xe2\x96\xbaDerya Akkaynak, aslen \xc4\xb0zmir, Urlal\xc4\xb1d\xc4\xb1r. Orta\xc3\xb6\xc4\x9fretim ve \xc3\x9cniversite e\xc4\x9fitimini Ankara\xe2\x80\x99da tamamlayan Dr. Derya Akkaynak ODT\xc3\x9c havac\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1k ve uzay m\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fini okuyarak 2003 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda birincilikle bitirmi\xc5\x9ftir MIT\xe2\x80\x98de havac\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1k ve uzay konusunda y\xc3\xbcksek lisans yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. O\xc5\x9finografi (okyanus bilimleri) alan\xc4\xb1nda doktora yapmaya karar vermi\xc5\x9f ve American Academy of Underwater Sciences (AAUS) ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma dalg\xc4\xb1c\xc4\xb1 2011 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda g\xc3\xb6n\xc3\xbcll\xc3\xbclerden olu\xc5\x9fan www.divers4oceanography.org  program\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 ba\xc5\x9flatm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Endonezya, Antarktika, K\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1ldeniz, Ege Denizi, Alaska, Atlantik ve Pasifik okyanusu gibi yerlerde ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. \xc5\x9euan Harbour Branch O\xc5\x9finografi Enstit\xc3\xbcs\xc3\xbc\xe2\x80\x99nde (Florida Atlantic \xc3\x9cniversitesi) \xe2\x80\x98de karada ve su alt\xc4\xb1nda g\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbcnt\xc3\xbcleme problemlerine odakl\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmaktad\xc4\xb1r.\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xbaYay\xc4\xb1n Tarih Saati: 25 Mart 21.00\\n\xe2\x96\xbaKonuk \xc4\xb0leti\xc5\x9fim: H. \xc5\x9eevval Artan\\n\xe2\x96\xbaYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1: B\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9fra Resulo\xc4\x9flu\\n\xe2\x96\xbaYay\xc4\xb1n Teknik/Reji: Buse Kulo\xc4\x9flu\\n\xe2\x96\xbaSosyal Medya/ \xc4\xb0leti\xc5\x9fim: Mert \xc3\x87\xc4\xb1kla ve Sosyal Medya Ekibi\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba \xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler:\\n00:00 - title: İklim Değişikliği ve Kutuplar - Doç. Dr. Burcu Özsoy

description: Antarktika\'daki iklim de\xc4\x9fi\xc5\x9fikli\xc4\x9fi \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 anlatmak \xc3\xbczerine bir yay\xc4\xb1n.\\n\\n\xc3\x96zge\xc3\xa7mi\xc5\x9f:\\nDo\xc3\xa7. Dr. Burcu \xc3\x96zsoy, 1976 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Gaziantep\'te do\xc4\x9fmu\xc5\x9ftur. Y\xc4\xb1ld\xc4\xb1z Teknik \xc3\x9cniversitesi Jeodezi-Fotogrametri M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fi alan\xc4\xb1nda lisans ve y\xc3\xbcksek lisans derecesi ile mezun olmu\xc5\x9f, 2001 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda \xc4\xb0stanbul Teknik \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma g\xc3\xb6revlisi olarak g\xc3\xb6reve ba\xc5\x9flam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r.[3] 2003 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda San Antonio Teksas \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde (UTSA) Uzaktan Alg\xc4\xb1lama ve Jeoinformatik Laboratuvar\xc4\xb1, Jeoloji Bilimleri B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbc\'ne kat\xc4\xb1lm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. 2005 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda UTSA\'da doktoras\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xbczerinde \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1rken, NASA Goddard Uzay U\xc3\xa7u\xc5\x9f Merkezi\'nde \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fanlar da dahil olmak \xc3\xbczere kilit ABD\'li ve di\xc4\x9fer uluslararas\xc4\xb1 bilim adamlar\xc4\xb1 ve kurumlarla tan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. 2006 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Antarktika\'ya gitmi\xc5\x9f, doktora ile Antarktika deniz buzunun uzaktan alg\xc4\xb1lanmas\xc4\xb1nda \xc3\xb6nemli bir tez bilgi bo\xc5\x9flu\xc4\x9funu doldurmu\xc5\x9ftur. 2007 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda UTSA\'da Amerikan Fotogrametri ve Uzaktan Alg\xc4\xb1lama Derne\xc4\x9fi (ASPRS) b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbc kurmu\xc5\x9ftur. T\xc3\xbcrkiye\'deki t\xc3\xbcm kutup bilimlerinden sorumlu olan ilk kutup ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma merkezi \xc4\xb0stanbul Teknik \xc3\x9cniversitesi Kutup Ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar\xc4\xb1 Uyg-Ar Merkezi\'nin (\xc4\xb0T\xc3\x9c PolReC) kurucusu ve m\xc3\xbcdiresidir. 2016\'da bir T\xc3\xbcrk ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma \xc3\xbcss\xc3\xbc ile Antarktik ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalara katk\xc4\xb1da bulunmak i\xc3\xa7in Antarktika\'ya lider yard\xc4\xb1mc\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1 olarak geri d\xc3\xb6nm\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9f, Ayr\xc4\xb1ca Uluslararas\xc4\xb1 Kutup G\xc3\xb6zlemevi Bilim Kurulu\'na da dahil edilmi\xc5\x9ftir. T\xc3\xbcrkiye Cumhuriyeti Cumhurba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 himayesinde ve Sanayi ve Teknoloji Bakanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 ile \xc4\xb0stanbul Teknik \xc3\x9cniversitesi Kutup Ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar\xc4\xb1 Uyg-Ar Merkezi (\xc4\xb0T\xc3\x9c PolReC) koordinasyonunda birinci, ikinci ve \xc3\xbc\xc3\xa7\xc3\xbcnc\xc3\xbc T\xc3\xbcrk Antarktika Seferlerine \xc3\xb6nderlik etmi\xc5\x9ftir.\\n\\n\\n#iklimde\xc4\x9fi\xc5\x9fikli\xc4\x9fi   #kutuplar  #Antarktika\\n\\n\xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler:\\n00:00 Intro\\n03:00 Ba\xc5\x9flang\xc4\xb1\xc3\xa7\\n03:37 Do\xc3\xa7.Dr. Burcu \xc3\x96zsoy ve \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar\xc4\xb1\\n05:01 Do\xc3\xa7.Dr. Burcu \xc3\x96zsoy\'un ilk Antarttika ziyareti (Deniz buzu, kara buzu)\\n07:15 Ziyaretten sonra yap\xc4\xb1lan \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar\\n10:26 Antarttika \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar\xc4\xb1ndan neler \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frendik? title:
Başarılı Anadolu Kadını : Yönetmen Ümmiye Anne // Ümmiye Koçak //
              Geleceğine Yön Verenler S1B7
description: New York Avrasya Film Festivali\'nde \'Sinemada En \xc4\xb0yi Avrasyal\xc4\xb1 Kad\xc4\xb1n Sanat\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1\' \xc3\xb6d\xc3\xbcl\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbc alan \'Y\xc3\xbcn Bebek\' filminin yazar\xc4\xb1, y\xc3\xb6netmeni ve Arslank\xc3\xb6y Kad\xc4\xb1nlar Tiyatro Toplulu\xc4\x9fu\'nun kurucusu \xc3\x9cmmiye Ko\xc3\xa7ak, \\"Gelece\xc4\x9fine Y\xc3\xb6n Verenler\\" adl\xc4\xb1 canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z Per\xc5\x9fembe ( 11.02.2021) saat 21.00\'da sizlerle.\\n#\xc3\xbcmmiyeko\xc3\xa7ak #y\xc3\xb6netmen #y\xc3\xbcnbebek\\n\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba Tu\xc4\x9f\xc3\xa7e Ba\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1o\xc4\x9flu\\nSosyal Medya \xc4\xb0leti\xc5\x9fim: Mert \xc3\x87\xc4\xb1kla\\nReji : Buse Kulo\xc4\x9flu, Ali Arif \xc3\x87ekici ve Gamze Sahman\\n\\nKonu\xc4\x9fun \xc3\x96zge\xc3\xa7mi\xc5\x9fi : \xc3\x9cmmiye Ko\xc3\xa7ak, 10 \xc3\xa7ocuklu bir ailenin \xc3\xa7ocu\xc4\x9fu olarak 1957 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Adana\'n\xc4\xb1n \xc3\x87elemli K\xc3\xb6y\xc3\xbc\'nde do\xc4\x9fdu. \xc4\xb0lkokuldan sonra okula g\xc3\xb6nderilmedi. Ki\xc5\x9fisel geli\xc5\x9fimini okudu\xc4\x9fu kitaplarla ger\xc3\xa7ekle\xc5\x9ftirmeye \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1. Evlendikten sonra Mersin\'e ta\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1nd\xc4\xb1. K\xc3\xb6y kad\xc4\xb1nlar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n ya\xc5\x9famlar\xc4\xb1na dikkat \xc3\xa7ekmek i\xc3\xa7in 2001 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda \\"Arslank\xc3\xb6y Kad\xc4\xb1nlar Tiyatro Toplulu\xc4\x9fu\\"nu kurdu. Kurdu\xc4\x9fu toplulu\xc4\x9fun ilk oyunu ise Remzi \xc3\x96z\xc3\xa7elik\'in Ta\xc5\x9f Bademleri adl\xc4\xb1 oyunu oldu. Ard\xc4\xb1ndan Kad\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n Feryad\xc4\xb1 ad\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 ta\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1yan ve kendi hik\xc3\xa2yeleri konulu olan oyunu sahneye ta\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1d\xc4\xb1. Hasret \xc3\x87i\xc3\xa7ekleri adl\xc4\xb1 oyunu ise 2006\'da Sabanc\xc4\xb1 Uluslararas\xc4\xb1 Adana Tiyatro Festivali\'nde sahnelendi. Tar\xc4\xb1mdan elde etti\xc4\x9fi gelir ile kad\xc4\xb1na y\xc3\xb6nelik \xc5\x9fiddete dikkat \xc3\xa7eken Y\xc3\xbcn Bebek filminin senaryosunu yazd\xc4\xb1 ve y\xc3\xb6netti. 49. Antalya Alt\xc4\xb1n Portakal Film Festivali\'nde galas\xc4\xb1 yap\xc4\xb1lan film ile New York Avrasya Film Festivali\'nde \\"Sinemada en iyi Avrasyal\xc4\xb1 Kad\xc4\xb1n Sanat\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1\\" \xc3\xb6d\xc3\xbcl\xc3\xbcne lay\xc4\xb1k g\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbcld\xc3\xbc. 2017\'de ise Cristiano Ronaldo\'nun oynad\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 T\xc3\xbcrk Telekom reklam\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n y\xc3\xb6netti.\\n\\n\xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler: \\n00:00 Giri\xc5\x9f\\n01:47 \xc3\x9cmmiye Ko\xc3\xa7ak \\"\xc3\x9cmmiye Anne\\" e\xc4\x9fitimine nerede ba\xc5\x9flad\xc4\xb1?\\n04:31 Evlendi\xc4\x9fi d\xc3\xb6nemde \xc3\xb6yk\xc3\xbc yazmay\xc4\xb1 veya film \xc3\xa7ekmeyi d\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9f\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbcyor muydu?\\n08:42 Aslank\xc3\xb6y kad\xc4\xb1nlar toplulu\xc4\x9fu nas\xc4\xb1l kuruldu?\\n11:10 Film: Batman Ba\xc5\x9fl\xc4\xb1yor (Christopher Nolan) \\"Neden d\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9feriz?\\"\\n12:44 Ya\xc5\x9fan\xc4\xb1lan zorluklar\xc4\xb1n \xc3\xbcstesinden nas\xc4\xb1l gelindi?\\n14:01 Topluluk kurulduktan sonra neler oldu?\\n15:39 Ne zaman destek\xc3\xa7iler kazanmaya ba\xc5\x9flad\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1z?\\n16:20 Film \xc3\xa7ekmeye ne zaman karar verdi? title: Siyaset Felsefesi: Devlet ve Anayasa Nedir?
keywords: siyaset felsefesi devlet nasıl ortaya çıkmıştır
description: Hocam\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1n ad\xc4\xb1 Furkan \xc3\x87irkin\\nFurkan \xc3\x87irkin\\n\\n1992 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Konya\xe2\x80\x99da do\xc4\x9fdu. Ankara ve Malatya\xe2\x80\x99da farkl\xc4\xb1 Fen ve Anadolu liselerinde okuduktan sonra \xc3\xbcniversite giri\xc5\x9f s\xc4\xb1navlar\xc4\xb1nda (YGS-LYS) il birincisi olarak ve T\xc3\xbcrkiye derecesi yaparak (s\xc3\xb6zel, say\xc4\xb1sal ve e\xc5\x9fit a\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1rl\xc4\xb1k puan t\xc3\xbcrlerinde T\xc3\xbcrkiye 20.\xe2\x80\x99si, 30.\xe2\x80\x99su, 50.\xe2\x80\x99si) \xc4\xb0stanbul\xe2\x80\x99a gitti. \xc4\xb0stanbul \xc3\x9cniversitesinde Hukuk ve Felsefe b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcmlerinden y\xc3\xbcksek onur \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frencisi olarak mezun oldu. Birincilikle girdi\xc4\x9fi \xc4\xb0stanbul \xc3\x9cniversitesi Kamu Hukuku y\xc3\xbcksek lisans program\xc4\xb1ndan \xe2\x80\x98\xe2\x80\x98Temsilde Adalet ve Y\xc3\xb6netimde \xc4\xb0stikrar \xc4\xb0lkeleri I\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1nda Se\xc3\xa7im Sistemleri, H\xc3\xbck\xc3\xbcmet Bi\xc3\xa7imleri ve T\xc3\xbcrkiye Cumhuriyeti\xe2\x80\x99nin Anayasal D\xc3\xbczeni\xe2\x80\x99\xe2\x80\x99 ba\xc5\x9fl\xc4\xb1kl\xc4\xb1 teziyle mezun oldu. Yine \xc4\xb0stanbul \xc3\x9cniversitesinde birincilikle girmeye hak kazand\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 Kamu Hukuku doktora program\xc4\xb1na devam ediyor. Y\xc3\xbcksek lisans ve doktora \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenimi boyunca T\xc3\x9cB\xc4\xb0TAK Bilim \xc4\xb0nsan\xc4\xb1 Destekleme Dairesi taraf\xc4\xb1ndan bursiyer olarak desteklendi. \\nFarkl\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xbcniversitelerde siyasal bilgiler ve hukuk fak\xc3\xbcltelerinde ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma g\xc3\xb6revlili\xc4\x9fi yapt\xc4\xb1. Halihaz\xc4\xb1rda Anadolu \xc3\x9cniversitesi Hukuk Fak\xc3\xbcltesi Anayasa Hukuku anabilim dal\xc4\xb1nda ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma g\xc3\xb6revlisi olarak \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1yor. Se\xc3\xa7im ittifaklar\xc4\xb1, parlamentonun felsefi arka plan\xc4\xb1, Sosyalist ve \xc4\xb0slami anayasalarda ideoloji gibi konularda uluslararas\xc4\xb1 kitap b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbc ve ulusal-uluslararas\xc4\xb1 hakemli dergilerde makaleleri mevcut. Anayasa hukuku ve devlet teorileri \xc3\xbczerine ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar yap\xc4\xb1yor.\\n\\n\\n\\n\\nDevlet Nedir ve Nas\xc4\xb1l Ortaya \xc3\x87\xc4\xb1km\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r?\\n\\nEgemenlik, Toplulumlar, Sermaye Egemenli\xc4\x9fi\\n\\nRahip S\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1f\xc4\xb1 m\xc4\xb1 egemen?\\n\\nDevlet Kuramlar\xc4\xb1 Nedir?\\n\\nY\xc3\xb6netim \xc5\x9eekilleri nelerdir?\\n\\nModern Devlet?\\n\\n(\xc3\x96zel M\xc3\xbclkiyet)\\n\\nAnayasa Nedir?\\n\\nAnayasa \xc3\xa7er\xc3\xa7evesinde kamu haklar\xc4\xb1?\\n\\nGelecekte Devlet Olacak m\xc4\xb1?\\n\\n\\n#siyaset  #felsefe #hukuk\\n\\n\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\\n\xe2\x96\xba Gelecek Bilimde kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda, bilimin her alan\xc4\xb1ndan \xc3\xb6zg\xc3\xbcn canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1nlar bulabilirsiniz. \\nFizikten biyolojiye, yapay zekadan psikolojiye, m\xc3\xbczik analizinden astronomiye, satran\xc3\xa7tan teknoloji haberlerine kadar bir\xc3\xa7ok i\xc3\xa7eri\xc4\x9fi her g\xc3\xbcn ka\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1rmamak i\xc3\xa7in kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za abone olun! title:

description: Ege Tekiner\'in Ankara\'dan Florida\'ya uzanan Blockchain hikayesini dinleyece\xc4\x9fimiz  \'Gelece\xc4\x9fine Y\xc3\xb6n Verenler\' adl\xc4\xb1 canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z Per\xc5\x9fembe ( 28.01.2021) saat 21.00\'da sizlerle.\\n#kripto #kriptopara #bitcoin #blockchain\\n\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1lar \xe2\x96\xba Melis Zenginler ve Tu\xc4\x9f\xc3\xa7e Ba\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1o\xc4\x9flu\\nSosyal Medya \xc4\xb0leti\xc5\x9fim: Mert \xc3\x87\xc4\xb1kla\\nReji : Buse Kulo\xc4\x9flu ve Ali Arif \xc3\x87ekici\\n\\nEge Tekiner, 1 Temmuz 1996 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Ankara\xe2\x80\x99da do\xc4\x9fdu. Ankara \xc3\x9cniversitesi Bilgisayar M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fi e\xc4\x9fitimini tamamlad\xc4\xb1. Bilgisayarla 5 ya\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1nda tan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1 ve her zaman gelecekteki mesle\xc4\x9finin bilgisayar ile alakal\xc4\xb1 olmas\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 istedi. Lise y\xc4\xb1llar\xc4\xb1nda Bilgisayar M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fi okumaya karar verdi ve o y\xc4\xb1llarda kendini geli\xc5\x9ftirmek i\xc3\xa7in ilk ad\xc4\xb1mlar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 att\xc4\xb1. \\"Her gencin oldu\xc4\x9fu gibi, benimde hayalim \xe2\x80\x9cHacker\xe2\x80\x9d olmakt\xc4\xb1\\" diyen Tekiner, bu alanda 3 y\xc4\xb1l lisede kendini geli\xc5\x9ftirmeye \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1 ve \xc3\xbcniversitenin ilk y\xc4\xb1llar\xc4\xb1nda bu alanlarda e\xc4\x9fitimler ald\xc4\xb1. Lisede kendini geli\xc5\x9ftirmeye \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 s\xc3\xbcre\xc3\xa7te, okudu\xc4\x9fu baz\xc4\xb1 kaynaklarda Bitcoin denen Kripto Para ile tan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1. title:
Sokaklardan Kpss 25.'liğine // Hakan Efe // Geleceğine Yön
              Verenler S1B3
description: Sokaklardan KPSS 25.\'li\xc4\x9fine uzanan m\xc3\xbccadeleci ba\xc5\x9far\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xb6yk\xc3\xbcs\xc3\xbc ile Hakan Efe, \\"Gelece\xc4\x9fine Y\xc3\xb6n Verenler\\" adl\xc4\xb1 canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda Cuma ( 15.01.2021) saat 21.00\'da sizlerle.\\n#kpss #hakanefe #gelecekbilimde \\n\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1lar \xe2\x96\xba Melis Zenginler ve Tu\xc4\x9f\xc3\xa7e Ba\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1o\xc4\x9flu\\nSosyal Medya \xc4\xb0leti\xc5\x9fim: Mert \xc3\x87\xc4\xb1kla\\nReji : Buse Kulo\xc4\x9flu ve Ali Arif \xc3\x87ekici\\n\\nHakan Efe, 1988 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Konya\'n\xc4\xb1n Sel\xc3\xa7uklu il\xc3\xa7esinde do\xc4\x9fdu. Antalya Fen Lisesi mezunudur. \xc3\x87e\xc5\x9fitli y\xc4\xb1llarda \xc3\xbcniversite s\xc4\xb1navlar\xc4\xb1nda ilk 12 bine girerek bir kere \xc4\xb0T\xc3\x9c \xc4\xb0n\xc5\x9faat M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fine, bir kere de \xc4\xb0stanbul \xc3\x9cniversitesi Eczac\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9fa yerle\xc5\x9fmi\xc5\x9ftir fakat ikisini de maddi imkans\xc4\xb1zl\xc4\xb1klardan dolay\xc4\xb1 bitirememi\xc5\x9ftir. 2014 Lise Kpss\'de 98.5 puanla T\xc3\xbcrkiye 13.s\xc3\xbc olmu\xc5\x9ftur ve Marmara \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde memurlu\xc4\x9fa atanm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. O s\xc4\xb1rada Marmara \xc3\x9cniversitesi Eczac\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1k B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcne ge\xc3\xa7i\xc5\x9f yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r fakat annesinin kanser oldu\xc4\x9funu \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frendikten sonra, annesinin yan\xc4\xb1nda olmak istemesinden dolay\xc4\xb1 memurluk ve okul hayat\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 tekrardan b\xc4\xb1rakmak zorunda kalm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r.  Pandemiden dolay\xc4\xb1 i\xc5\x9f bulamad\xc4\xb1klar\xc4\xb1 i\xc3\xa7in abisiyle geri d\xc3\xb6n\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9f\xc3\xbcm at\xc4\xb1klar\xc4\xb1 toplay\xc4\xb1c\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 yapmaya ba\xc5\x9flam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9flard\xc4\xb1r. Bu sene yap\xc4\xb1lan Lise KPSS\'de 96.5 puanla T\xc3\xbcrkiye 25.si olmu\xc5\x9ftur. title: Cahilleri için Havacılık | Muhammed Yılmaz (Boarding Info)
description: Cahilleri i\xc3\xa7in serimize Havac\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1k ile devam ediyoruz! BoardingInfo kanal\xc4\xb1nda U\xc3\xa7ak M\xc3\xbchendisi Muhammed Y\xc4\xb1lmaz cahilleri i\xc3\xa7in havac\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 anlatt\xc4\xb1.\\n\xe2\x96\xba \xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler:\\n00:00 - A\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f ve ikram\\n00:11 - Giri\xc5\x9f \\u0026 Biz kimiz?\\n00:54 - Neden \\"Cahilleri i\xc3\xa7in...\\" ?\\n02:15 - Muhammed Y\xc4\xb1lmaz Kimdir?\\n04:36 - 1-Koskoca metal y\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 havada saatlerce nas\xc4\xb1l u\xc3\xa7uyor?\\n07:28 - 2-A\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1r\xc4\xb1 t\xc3\xbcrb\xc3\xbclansta kanat k\xc4\xb1r\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1r m\xc4\xb1? T\xc3\xbcrb\xc3\xbclans u\xc3\xa7a\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 d\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9f\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbcr m\xc3\xbc?\\n10:03 - 3-U\xc3\xa7akta korona bula\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1r m\xc4\xb1?\\n12:00 - 4-Havac\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1k sekt\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbc ne zaman normale d\xc3\xb6necek?\\n14:15 - 5-Boeing 737 Max ne olacak?\\n17:25 - 6-U\xc3\xa7aklar\xc4\xb1n arkas\xc4\xb1ndaki beyaz izler (contrail) nedir?\\n19:55 - 7-U\xc3\xa7ak kazalar\xc4\xb1 en \xc3\xa7ok ne zaman oluyor? title: Biyomimikri ve Uzay Araştırmaları // Ayşe Meriç Yazıcı
description: \\"Blue Marble Space Institute\'den Ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmac\xc4\xb1 Bilim \xc4\xb0nsan\xc4\xb1 Ay\xc5\x9fe Meri\xc3\xa7 YAZICI ile \\"Biyomimikri ve Uzay Ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar\xc4\xb1\\" adl\xc4\xb1 Youtube canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z sizlerle.  #Biyomimikri #Uzay #BlueMarbleSpaceInstitute\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba  \xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler \\n\\n00:00 - A\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\\n00:13 - Merhaba\\n00:34 - Ay\xc5\x9fe Meri\xc3\xa7 YAZICI Kimdir?\\n01:34 - Biyomimikri Nedir?\\n02:54 - Sunum\\n42:47 - Soru \\u0026 Cevap\\n48:39 - Ay\xc5\x9fe hocan\xc4\xb1n ilham verici hikayesi\\n55:30 - Kapan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\\n\\nAy\xc5\x9fe Meri\xc3\xa7 Yaz\xc4\xb1c\xc4\xb1 1 Ocak 1985 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Konya\'da do\xc4\x9fmu\xc5\x9ftur. 2013-2016 y\xc4\xb1llar\xc4\xb1 aras\xc4\xb1nda \xc4\xb0stanbul Ayd\xc4\xb1n \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde y\xc3\xbcksek lisans\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 tamamlam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. title: Neden İngilizce Öğrenemiyoruz?
description: Bu yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda neden ingilizce \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenemedi\xc4\x9fimizi ve de ingilizce e\xc4\x9fitimi hakk\xc4\xb1nda konu\xc5\x9ftuk.\\n\\nKonuk: Prof. Dr. Kemal Sinan \xc3\x96zmen\\n\\nHocamz\xc4\xb1\xc4\xb1n k\xc4\xb1saca \xc3\xb6z ge\xc3\xa7mi\xc5\x9fi:\\nGazi \xc3\x9cniversitesi, Gazi E\xc4\x9fitim Fak\xc3\xbcltesi, \xc4\xb0ngiliz Dili E\xc4\x9fitimi Anabilim Dal\xc4\xb1\xe2\x80\x99nda \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9fretim \xc3\xbcyesi olarak g\xc3\xb6rev yap\xc4\xb1yorum. 2009 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1ndan bu yana \xe2\x80\x9cThe Journal of Language Teaching and Learning\xe2\x80\x9d dergisinin ba\xc5\x9f edit\xc3\xb6rl\xc3\xbc\xc4\x9f\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbc y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbct\xc3\xbcyorum. Son y\xc4\xb1llarda roman ve \xc3\xb6yk\xc3\xbc t\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbcnde \xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbcnler \xc3\xbczerinde \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1yorum."

Maker \xc3\x87ocuk markas\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n kurucular\xc4\xb1ndan Zeynep Karag\xc3\xb6z kendini bir PRO-MAKER olarak tan\xc4\xb1ml\xc4\xb1yor. Maker At\xc3\xb6lye \xc3\xa7at\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1 alt\xc4\xb1nda Maker k\xc3\xbclt\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbc yaymak ve geli\xc5\x9ftirmek i\xc3\xa7in projeler ve e\xc4\x9fitimler d\xc3\xbczenliyor. description: Say\xc4\xb1n Prof. Dr. G\xc3\xbclfem Sezen Bal\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1kanl\xc4\xb1 hocam\xc4\xb1z ile \\"Sporda Fairplay Kavram\xc4\xb1 ve \xc3\x96nemi\\" konulu yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1n tekrar\xc4\xb1yla sizlerleyiz Sporda Fair Play Nedir? \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenmek istiyorsan\xc4\xb1z yay\xc4\xb1n tekrar\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1 mutlaka izlemelisiniz.\\n#spor #fairplay #ahlak\\n\\nKonuk: Prof. Dr. G\xc3\xbclfem Sezen Bal\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1kanl\xc4\xb1 \\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1: Ak\xc4\xb1n Karahasan\\nHocam\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1n k\xc4\xb1saca \xc3\xb6z ge\xc3\xa7mi\xc5\x9fi:\\n\\n06.12.1979 tarihinde Ankara\'da do\xc4\x9fmu\xc5\x9ftur. 1996 - 2000 y\xc4\xb1llar\xc4\xb1 aras\xc4\xb1nda Gazi \xc3\x9cniversitesi Beden E\xc4\x9fitimi \xc3\x96\xc4\x9fretmenli\xc4\x9fi b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbc lisans\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1, 2001- 2003 y\xc4\xb1llar\xc4\xb1 aras\xc4\xb1nda \\"Profesyonel ve Amat\xc3\xb6r Futbolcular\xc4\xb1n Fair Play Anlay\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9flar\xc4\xb1 \xc3\x9czerine Bir Ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma\\" tezi ile y\xc3\xbcksek lisans\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1, 2003-2009  aras\xc4\xb1nda \\" Profesyonel Futbolcular\xc4\xb1n Fair Playe Y\xc3\xb6nelik Davran\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9flar\xc4\xb1 ile Empatik E\xc4\x9filim D\xc3\xbczeyleri Aras\xc4\xb1ndaki \xc4\xb0li\xc5\x9fki \\" tezi ile doktoras\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 tamamlam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. title: Adli Genetik Uygulamaları // Prof. Dr. Nevzat ALKAN
description: Say\xc4\xb1n Prof. Dr. Nevzat ALKAN ile \\"Adli Genetik Uygulamalar\xc4\xb1\\" adl\xc4\xb1 Youtube yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1n tekrar\xc4\xb1 sizlerle.\\nBu yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda Adli T\xc4\xb1pta Genetik Uygulamalar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n tarihsel geli\xc5\x9fimi \xc3\xbczerinde durduk. Yay\xc4\xb1n sonlar\xc4\xb1na do\xc4\x9fru ise sizlerden gelen sorular\xc4\xb1 cevapland\xc4\xb1rmaya \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1k.\\n\\nHocam\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1n K\xc4\xb1saca \xc3\x96z Ge\xc3\xa7mi\xc5\x9fi:\\n\\nEyl\xc3\xbcl 1993\xe2\x80\x99de \xc4\xb0stanbul \xc3\x9cniversitesi, \xc4\xb0stanbul T\xc4\xb1p Fak\xc3\xbcltesi, Adli T\xc4\xb1p Anabilim Dal\xc4\xb1nda T\xc4\xb1pta Uzmanl\xc4\xb1k E\xc4\x9fitimine ba\xc5\x9flad\xc4\xb1. Uzmanl\xc4\xb1k e\xc4\x9fitimi s\xc4\xb1ras\xc4\xb1nda 15 ay s\xc3\xbcreyle Adalet Bakanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1\xe2\x80\x99na ba\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1, Adli T\xc4\xb1p Kurumu Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n \xc3\xa7e\xc5\x9fitli \xc3\xbcnitelerinde e\xc4\x9fitimler ald\xc4\xb1. May\xc4\xb1s 1996\xe2\x80\x99da T\xc4\xb1pta Uzmanl\xc4\xb1k E\xc4\x9fitimini tamamlayarak Ya\xc5\x9flanmaya Ba\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1 Yaz\xc4\xb1 ve \xc4\xb0mza De\xc4\x9fi\xc5\x9fiklikleri Ba\xc5\x9fl\xc4\xb1kl\xc4\xb1 tez ile Adli T\xc4\xb1p Uzman\xc4\xb1 oldu ve ayn\xc4\xb1 birimde Adli T\xc4\xb1p Uzman\xc4\xb1 olarak \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmaya ba\xc5\x9flad\xc4\xb1. Nisan 1997\xe2\x80\x93Nisan 1998 aras\xc4\xb1nda 1 y\xc4\xb1l s\xc3\xbcre ile \xc4\xb0stanbul \xc3\x9cniversitesi, Adli T\xc4\xb1p Enstit\xc3\xbcs\xc3\xbcnde Adli T\xc4\xb1p Uzman\xc4\xb1 olarak g\xc3\xb6rev yapt\xc4\xb1 ve sonras\xc4\xb1nda \xc4\xb0stanbul T\xc4\xb1p Fak\xc3\xbcltesi, Adli T\xc4\xb1p Anabilim Dal\xc4\xb1\xe2\x80\x99ndaki g\xc3\xb6revine geri d\xc3\xb6nd\xc3\xbc. LGBT+ hakk\xc4\xb1nda daha fazla bilgi sahibi olmak ve \xc3\xb6nyarg\xc4\xb1lar\xc4\xb1 bir kenara b\xc4\xb1rakmak i\xc3\xa7in bu yay\xc4\xb1n tekrar\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1 izleyin!\\n\\nKonuk \xe2\x96\xba Beyza Ergen\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba Burak \xc3\x87ankaya\\n\\n\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\\nBeyza Ergen, psikoloji b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcnden mezun olduktan sonra klinik psikoloji y\xc3\xbcksek lisans\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 tamamlam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f, ard\xc4\xb1ndan yine klinik psikoloji alan\xc4\xb1nda doktora e\xc4\x9fitimine ba\xc5\x9flam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Doktora e\xc4\x9fitiminde tez a\xc5\x9famas\xc4\xb1ndad\xc4\xb1r ve \xc4\xb0stanbul Sabahattin Zaim \xc3\x9cniversitesi\xe2\x80\x99nde \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9fretim g\xc3\xb6revlisi olarak \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmaktad\xc4\xb1r. 2010 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1ndan itibaren yeti\xc5\x9fkin ve ergen odakl\xc4\xb1 psikoterapi deste\xc4\x9fi vermektedir ve Psikodinamik Psikoterapi, \xc5\x9eema Terapi ve EMDR y\xc3\xb6ntemleri ile \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmaktad\xc4\xb1r.\\nY\xc3\xbcksek Lisans ve Doktora s\xc3\xbcre\xc3\xa7lerinde T\xc3\xbcrkiye\xe2\x80\x99nin se\xc3\xa7kin akademisyenlerinden ald\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 teorik e\xc4\x9fitimlere ek olarak, psikoterapinin nas\xc4\xb1l uygulan\xc4\xb1ld\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9fretildi\xc4\x9fi Yola\xc3\xa7\xe2\x80\x99tan alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r.\\nPsikoterapinin dan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fan a\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1ndan sa\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1kl\xc4\xb1 ve verimli ilerleyebilmesi i\xc3\xa7in gerekli olan etik ilkelere, terapi ili\xc5\x9fkisine, psikoterapi \xc3\xa7er\xc3\xa7evesine \xc3\xb6nem veren, mesleki anlamda kendini geli\xc5\x9ftirmeyi ama\xc3\xa7 edinen bir psikoterapist olarak title: COVID-19 Safsataları | Dr. Işıl Arıcan #yalansavar
description: Yalansavar.org\'dan Dr. I\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1l Ar\xc4\xb1can ile COVID-19 salg\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 s\xc3\xbcresince kar\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1la\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z komplo teorilerini, yanl\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f anla\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1lmalar\xc4\xb1 ve safsatalar\xc4\xb1 konu\xc5\x9ftuk. \xc4\xb0nsanlar neden neden do\xc4\x9frusunu \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenmek yerine komplo teorilerine bu kadar kolay inan\xc4\xb1r? title:
Antrenman Biliminde Teknoloji | Doç. Dr. Bilal Utku
              ALEMDAROĞLU
description: Do\xc3\xa7. Dr. Bilal Utku ALEMDARO\xc4\x9eLU ile \\"Antrenman Biliminde Teknoloji\\" adl\xc4\xb1 youtube canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda teknolojinin spor ve antrenman alanlar\xc4\xb1nda kullan\xc4\xb1lmas\xc4\xb1 ve de teknolojinin antrenman \xc3\xbczerinde i\xc5\x9flevselli\xc4\x9fini konu\xc5\x9ftuk. \xc4\xb0statistik ve analizlere yer verdik. \\n\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1: Burak \xc3\x87ankaya\\nKonuk: Do\xc3\xa7. Dr. Bilal Utku ALEMDARO\xc4\x9eLU\\n\\nBilal Utku ALEMDARO\xc4\x9eLU lisans e\xc4\x9fitimini 2006 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Hacettepe \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde tamamlad\xc4\xb1ktan sonra 20014\' Ankara \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde doktoras\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Ard\xc4\xb1ndan 2015 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1da Pamukkale \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde Do\xc3\xa7ent unvan\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. \xc5\x9euan Pamukkale \xc3\x9cniversitesi\'nde Antrenman ve Hareket ABD Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 ve Antren\xc3\xb6rl\xc3\xbck E\xc4\x9fitimi B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 yapmaktad\xc4\xb1r. Ayn\xc4\xb1 zamanda pek\xc3\xa7ok spor kl\xc3\xbcb\xc3\xbcnde antren\xc3\xb6rl\xc3\xbck ve TFF\'de e\xc4\x9fitmenlik g\xc3\xb6revleri yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. title:
Yapay Zeka ve Geleceğin Meslekleri | Dr. Öğr. Üyesi Şebnem
              Özdemir
description: Dr. \xc3\x96\xc4\x9fr. \xc3\x9cyesi \xc5\x9eebnem \xc3\x96zdemir\'in konuk oldu\xc4\x9fu bu yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda geli\xc5\x9fmekte olan yapay zeka ve buna ba\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1 olarak gelecekti mesleklerin gidi\xc5\x9fat\xc4\xb1 ve de\xc4\x9fi\xc5\x9fimi hakk\xc4\xb1nda ilgililerin faydal\xc4\xb1 bilgiler \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenebilece\xc4\x9fi g\xc3\xbczel bir sohbet yapt\xc4\xb1k.\\n\\nKonuk \xe2\x96\xba Dr. \xc3\x96\xc4\x9fr. \xc3\x9cyesi \xc5\x9eebnem \xc3\x96zdemir\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba Burak \xc3\x87ankaya\\n\\n\xc5\x9eebnem \xc3\x96zdemir Y\xc4\xb1ld\xc4\xb1z Teknik \xc3\x9cniversitesi Matematik b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcnden lisans derecesini alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Biri Matematik E\xc4\x9fitimi di\xc4\x9feri Enformatik alan\xc4\xb1nda olmak \xc3\xbczere \xc4\xb0stanbul \xc3\x9cniversitesi\xe2\x80\x99nde iki y\xc3\xbcksek lisans e\xc4\x9fitimi tamamlam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Doktora derecesini \xc4\xb0stanbul \xc3\x9cniversitesi Enformatik Anabilim Dal\xc4\xb1\xe2\x80\x99ndan alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Doktora sonras\xc4\xb1 ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar\xc4\xb1 i\xc3\xa7in 2018 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Worcester Politeknik Enstit\xc3\xbcs\xc3\xbc (WPI) Elektronik ve Bilgisayar M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fi B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcnde bulunmu\xc5\x9ftur. 2019 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda ise Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) Bilgisayar Bilimi ve Yapay Zeka Laboratuvar\xc4\xb1nda (Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Lab- CSAIL) ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma i\xc5\x9fbirlik\xc3\xa7isi (research colloborator) olarak \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. 2016 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda geli\xc5\x9ftirdi\xc4\x9fi makine \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenmesi modeli ile Ko\xc3\xa7 \xc3\x9cniversitesi UNESCO K\xc3\xbcrs\xc3\xbcs\xc3\xbc taraf\xc4\xb1ndan verilen \xe2\x80\x9c\xc4\xb0nsan Geli\xc5\x9fimi Ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar\xc4\xb1 \xc3\x96d\xc3\xbcl\xc3\xbcne\xe2\x80\x9d lay\xc4\xb1k g\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbclm\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9ft\xc3\xbcr. Dr. \xc3\x96zdemir veri bilimi odakl\xc4\xb1 ve yapay zeka tabanl\xc4\xb1 pek \xc3\xa7ok ulusal ve uluslararas\xc4\xb1 projede y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbct\xc3\xbcc\xc3\xbc, dan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fman, ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmac\xc4\xb1 olarak g\xc3\xb6rev yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. \xc3\x96zellikle 2018 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n ba\xc5\x9flar\xc4\xb1ndan itibaren, ekibi ile birlikte \xc3\xa7e\xc5\x9fitli sekt\xc3\xb6rlerde \xe2\x80\x9cDeep Project\xe2\x80\x9d serisi olarak adland\xc4\xb1rd\xc4\xb1klar\xc4\xb1 derin \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenme tabanl\xc4\xb1 uygulama projeleri ger\xc3\xa7ekle\xc5\x9ftirmektedir. Bunlar aras\xc4\xb1ndan yapay zekan\xc4\xb1n sanat \xc3\xbcretmesi \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmalar\xc4\xb1nda T\xc3\xbcrk-Osmanl\xc4\xb1 sanat t\xc3\xbcrlerine odaklanan Deep Classical Art Projesi yurti\xc3\xa7i ve yurtd\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1nda ilgi ile kar\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1lanm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Dr. \xc3\x96zdemir\xe2\x80\x99in veri bilimi ve makine \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenmesi odakl\xc4\xb1 ulusal ve uluslararas\xc4\xb1 platformlarda yay\xc4\xb1nlanm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f pek \xc3\xa7ok kitap b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbc, makale \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmas\xc4\xb1 ve patentleri bulunmaktad\xc4\xb1r. Dr. \xc3\x96zdemir, yapay zeka tabanl\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbcn geli\xc5\x9ftirme odakl\xc4\xb1 yurt i\xc3\xa7i ve yurtd\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1 hizmet veren firmalarla i\xc5\x9fbirliklerine sahip olup dan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmanl\xc4\xb1klar vermektedir.\\nBilginin Kayna\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1: https://iisbf.istinye.edu.tr/tr/kadro/1477\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba\xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler\\n00:00 Giri\xc5\x9f\\n00:55 S\xc3\xbctla\xc3\xa7 kimdir? :)\\n02:18 Dr.\xc3\x96\xc4\x9fr. \xc3\x9cyesi \xc5\x9eebnem \xc3\x96zdemir kimdir?\\n04:06 Y\xc3\xb6netim bili\xc5\x9fim sistemleri (Management information system)\\n12:19 ...\\n13:20 Bir \xc3\xbclkede i\xc5\x9fletme a\xc3\xa7mak, yat\xc4\xb1r\xc4\xb1m yapmak istesek makine \xc3\xb6\xc4\x9frenmesini kullanabilir miyiz?\\n19:43 Mesleklerin gelece\xc4\x9fi ne olacak?\\n24:28 Yapay zeka ve t\xc3\xbckenmi\xc5\x9flik sendromu\\n25:45 Berberlik mesle\xc4\x9finin ge\xc3\xa7mi\xc5\x9fi ve bug\xc3\xbcn\xc3\xbc\\n32:30 \xc4\xb0nsano\xc4\x9flunun seyahat ve y\xc3\xbck ta\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1ma ihtiyac\xc4\xb1ndan do\xc4\x9fan mesleklerin de\xc4\x9fi\xc5\x9fimi\\n34:03 Soru-Cevap\\n01:18:45 Kapan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f\\n\\n\xe2\x96\xba Gelecek Bilimde kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda, bilimin her alan\xc4\xb1ndan \xc3\xb6zg\xc3\xbcn canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1nlar bulabilirsiniz. \\nFizikten biyolojiye, yapay zekadan psikolojiye, m\xc3\xbczik analizinden astronomiye, satran\xc3\xa7tan teknoloji haberlerine kadar bir \xc3\xa7ok i\xc3\xa7eri\xc4\x9fi her g\xc3\xbcn ka\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1rmamak i\xc3\xa7in kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za abone olun! title: Rajneeshee saldırısı
description: Prof. Dr. Ahmet KOLUMAN ile yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f oldu\xc4\x9fumuz BioTer\xc3\xb6rizm yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zdan kesitler.\\n\\nKonuk \xe2\x96\xba Prof. Dr. Ahmet Koluman\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba Burak \xc3\x87ankaya\\n\\n\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\\nSay\xc4\xb1n Ahmet Koluman lisans e\xc4\x9fitimini Ankara \xc3\x9cniversitesi Veterinerlik Fak\xc3\xbcltesi\'nde tamamlad\xc4\xb1ktan sonra ayn\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xbcniversitede ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma g\xc3\xb6revlisi olarak g\xc3\xb6rev alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f ve 2006 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda doktor, 2017 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda do\xc3\xa7ent ve 2018 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda profes\xc3\xb6r unvan\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r.  \xc5\x9euanda Pamukkale \xc3\x9cniversitesi Biyomedikal M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fi B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbc\'nde g\xc3\xb6rev yapmaktad\xc4\xb1r.  Hocam\xc4\xb1z burada B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 ve Anabilim Dal\xc4\xb1 Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 g\xc3\xb6revleri y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbctm\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9ft\xc3\xbcr.  \xc3\x9cniversitede Biyofizik, Biyomedikal m\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fine giri\xc5\x9f vb. pek \xc3\xa7ok lisans dersini y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbctmektedir ve kariyeri boyunca uluslararas\xc4\xb1 hakemli dergilerde pek \xc3\xa7ok yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 bulunmaktad\xc4\xb1r. \\n\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\\n\xe2\x96\xba Gelecek Bilimde kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda, bilimin her alan\xc4\xb1ndan \xc3\xb6zg\xc3\xbcn canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1nlar bulabilirsiniz. \\nFizikten biyolojiye, yapay zekadan psikolojiye, m\xc3\xbczik analizinden astronomiye, satran\xc3\xa7tan teknoloji haberlerine kadar bir \xc3\xa7ok i\xc3\xa7eri\xc4\x9fi her g\xc3\xbcn ka\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1rmamak i\xc3\xa7in kanal\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za abone olun! title: Gelecek Bilimde 19 Mayıs Mesajı #19MAYIS1919
description: Gelecek Bilimde ailesi olarak size \\"farkl\xc4\xb1\\" bir 19 May\xc4\xb1s mesaj\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z var...\\n\\nBug\xc3\xbcn 19 May\xc4\xb1s 2020!\\n\\nTam 101 y\xc4\xb1l \xc3\xb6nce bu topraklarda, Anadolu\'da, bir kahraman umut olmak ve halk\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 her t\xc3\xbcrl\xc3\xbc prangadan kurtarmak i\xc3\xa7in Samsun\'a ayak bast\xc4\xb1. \\n\\nBiliyordu ki en b\xc3\xbcy\xc3\xbck d\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9fman cehaletti ve en b\xc3\xbcy\xc3\xbck sava\xc5\x9f cehalete kar\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1 verilecekti. Bu y\xc3\xbczden daha Milli M\xc3\xbccadele devam ederken vatan\xc4\xb1 kurtulmu\xc5\x9f say\xc4\xb1p cehaletle sava\xc5\x9fman\xc4\xb1n planlar\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 yapt\xc4\xb1 ve \xc3\xb6mr\xc3\xbcnce bu sava\xc5\x9fta bilimin saf\xc4\xb1nda korkusuz bir nefer olarak sava\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1. \xc2\xa0 \\n\\nH\xc3\xbcrriyet ancak ve vicdanlar ve ak\xc4\xb1llar h\xc3\xbcrle\xc5\x9fti\xc4\x9finde tam kazan\xc4\xb1lm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. title: Nano-Optik Ve Uygulamaları | Doç. Dr. Alpan Bek
description: Do\xc3\xa7. Dr. Alpan Bek ile \\"Nano-Optik Ve Uygulamalar\xc4\xb1\\" ba\xc5\x9fl\xc4\xb1kl\xc4\xb1 Youtube yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z bu cumartesi (16.05.2020) saat 19.00\'da sizlerle.\\n\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba Burak \xc3\x87ankaya\\nKonuk \xe2\x96\xba Do\xc3\xa7. Dr. Alpan Bek\\n\\nYay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n alt ba\xc5\x9fl\xc4\xb1klar\xc4\xb1:\\n\xe2\x97\xbeNano-optik ve uygulamalar\xc4\xb1\\n\xe2\x97\xbeG\xc3\xbcne\xc5\x9f enerjisinde Nano-Optik ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar\xc4\xb1\\n\xe2\x97\xbeNano g\xc3\xb6r\xc3\xbcnt\xc3\xbclemede kullan\xc4\xb1lan y\xc3\xb6ntemler(SNOM, AFM) \\n\xe2\x97\xbeG\xc3\x9cNAM\' da Nano-Optik ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar\xc4\xb1 \\n\\n#nanooptik #gelecekbilimde #evdekal\\n\\n\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x93\\nDo\xc3\xa7. Dr. Alpan Bek lisans e\xc4\x9fitimini Bilkent \xc3\x9cniversitesi Fizik b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcnde 1996 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda tamamlam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Y\xc3\xbcksek Lisans e\xc4\x9fitimini yine Bilkent \xc3\x9cniversitesi Fizik b\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbcnde 1998 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda  tamamlam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f ve Prof. Dr. Atilla Ayd\xc4\xb1nl\xc4\xb1 ile tez \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fmas\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. 1999 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda Ecole Polytecnique F\xc3\xa9d\xc3\xa9rale de Lausanne (EPFL) \'da doktora e\xc4\x9fitimine ba\xc5\x9flam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f, 2004 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda doktoras\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Bilkent \xc3\x9cniversitesi, University of California Santa Barbara, Max Planck institute, Ludwig Maximilians University of Munich\' de ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. \xc5\x9eu an ODT\xc3\x9c Fizik, Mikro ve Nano Teknoloji (y\xc3\xbcksek lisans program\xc4\xb1), N\xc3\xb6robilim ve N\xc3\xb6roteknoloji (y\xc3\xbcksek lisans program\xc4\xb1), ODT\xc3\x9c G\xc3\x9cNAM ve ODT\xc3\x9c OGAM \'da g\xc3\xb6rev yapmaktad\xc4\xb1r. Bir\xc3\xa7ok bilimsel yay\xc4\xb1n kurulu\xc5\x9flar\xc4\xb1nda edit\xc3\xb6rl\xc3\xbck ve hakemlik yapmaktad\xc4\xb1r.\\n\\n\xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler:\\n00:00 Giri\xc5\x9f\\n00:20 Ba\xc5\x9flang\xc4\xb1\xc3\xa7\\n03:40 Assoc.Prof.Dr. Alpan Bek ile yay\xc4\xb1n i\xc3\xa7eri\xc4\x9fi\\n05:18 Nano-optik\\n08:38 Do\xc4\x9fal nano-optik yap\xc4\xb1lar\\n12:51 Yapay nano-optik yap\xc4\xb1lar\\n15:43 I\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1k nedir? title: Veteriner hekimlik nedir?
description: Prof. Dr. Ahmet KOLUMAN ile bu pazar (26.04.2020) saat 20.00\'de yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f oldu\xc4\x9fumuz yay\xc4\xb1ndan baz\xc4\xb1 kesitler!\\n\\nKonuk \xe2\x96\xba Prof. Dr. Ahmet Koluman\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba Burak \xc3\x87ankaya\\n\\nSay\xc4\xb1n Ahmet Koluman lisans e\xc4\x9fitimini Ankara \xc3\x9cniversitesi Veterinerlik Fak\xc3\xbcltesi\'nde tamamlad\xc4\xb1ktan sonra ayn\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xbcniversitede ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma g\xc3\xb6revlisi olarak g\xc3\xb6rev alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f ve 2006 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda doktor, 2017 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda do\xc3\xa7ent ve 2018 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda profes\xc3\xb6r unvan\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r.  \xc5\x9euanda Pamukkale \xc3\x9cniversitesi Biyomedikal M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fi B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbc\'nde g\xc3\xb6rev yapmaktad\xc4\xb1r.  Hocam\xc4\xb1z burada B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 ve Anabilim Dal\xc4\xb1 Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 g\xc3\xb6revleri y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbctm\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9ft\xc3\xbcr.  \xc3\x9cniversitede Biyofizik, Biyomedikal m\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fine giri\xc5\x9f vb. pek \xc3\xa7ok lisans dersini y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbctmektedir ve kariyeri boyunca uluslararas\xc4\xb1 hakemli dergilerde pek \xc3\xa7ok yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 bulunmaktad\xc4\xb1r."

piramidi\\n35:07 Kitap: Y\xc3\xbczy\xc4\xb1llar Cilt III (Michael de Nostredame)\\n40:52 Biyoter\xc3\xb6r ve biyolojik sava\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1n fark\xc4\xb1\\n43:48 Tespit\\n45:51 Antibiyotik hekimlik\\n01:48:26 Dezenfeksiyon\\n01:50:17 Normale d\xc3\xb6n\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9f\\n01:52:18 \xc5\x9eark\xc4\xb1: Hey You! (Pink Floyd)\\n01:52:47 Yurtta Bar\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f, D\xc3\xbcnyada Bar\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f (M.Kemal Atat\xc3\xbcrk)\\n01:53:11 \xc5\x9eark\xc4\xb1: The dark side of the moon (Pink Floyd)\\n01:54:24 5G, baz istasyonu, \xc3\xa7akra, \xc3\xa7orba, t\xc3\xbcrk geni, \xc3\xa7ama\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1r suyu, ultraviyole, ...\\n02:00:56 Soru: Bilim kurulunun 38 \xc3\xbcyesinde hi\xc3\xa7 veteriner olmamas\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 nas\xc4\xb1l kar\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1yorsunuz?\\n\\n\\nSay\xc4\xb1n Ahmet Koluman lisans e\xc4\x9fitimini Ankara \xc3\x9cniversitesi Veterinerlik Fak\xc3\xbcltesi\'nde tamamlad\xc4\xb1ktan sonra ayn\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xbcniversitede ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rma g\xc3\xb6revlisi olarak g\xc3\xb6rev alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f ve 2006 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda doktor, 2017 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda do\xc3\xa7ent ve 2018 y\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1nda profes\xc3\xb6r unvan\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 alm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r.  \xc5\x9euanda Pamukkale \xc3\x9cniversitesi Biyomedikal M\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fi B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbc\'nde g\xc3\xb6rev yapmaktad\xc4\xb1r.  Hocam\xc4\xb1z burada B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 ve Anabilim Dal\xc4\xb1 Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 g\xc3\xb6revleri y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbctm\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9ft\xc3\xbcr.  \xc3\x9cniversitede Biyofizik, Biyomedikal m\xc3\xbchendisli\xc4\x9fine giri\xc5\x9f vb. pek \xc3\xa7ok lisans dersini y\xc3\xbcr\xc3\xbctmektedir ve kariyeri boyunca uluslararas\xc4\xb1 hakemli dergilerde pek \xc3\xa7ok yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 bulunmaktad\xc4\xb1r."

title:
Korku Salgını: Bu Günlerde Akıl Sağlığını Korumak | Dr. Samuray
              Özdemir
description: Dr. Samuray \xc3\x96zdemir ile yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f oldu\xc4\x9fumuz canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda salg\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n psikolojiye etkilerini ve ruh sa\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1 nas\xc4\xb1l koruyaca\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1 konu\xc5\x9ftuk.\\n\\nKonuk \xe2\x96\xba Uzm. Dr. Samuray \xc3\x96zdemir\\nYay\xc4\xb1nc\xc4\xb1 \xe2\x96\xba Cevdet Acarsoy, Burak \xc3\x87ankaya\\n\\n#koronavir\xc3\xbcs #covid19 #psikoloji #psikiyatri #gelecekbilimde\\n\\nKonu\xc4\x9fumuza Ait Sosyal Medya Ba\xc4\x9flant\xc4\xb1lar\xc4\xb1\\nTwitter \xe2\x96\xba https://twitter.com/idiogenic\\nInstagram \xe2\x96\xba https://instagram.com/drsamurayozdemir/\\n\\nAlt ba\xc5\x9fl\xc4\xb1klar ver sorular:\\n\xe2\x97\xbe Psikiyatri uzman\xc4\xb1 olarak psikoterapiye yakla\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1z? \xc4\xb0la\xc3\xa7 terapisine ilave olarak psikoterapiden yararlan\xc4\xb1yor musunuz?\\n\xe2\x97\xbe Covid-19 pandemisi, ruhsal travma ya\xc5\x9fant\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1 olarak da kabul edilir mi?\\n\xe2\x97\xbe Koronavir\xc3\xbcse  yakalanma korkular\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z yans\xc4\xb1malar\xc4\xb1 hangi durumlarda ruhsal rahats\xc4\xb1zl\xc4\xb1k olarak s\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1fland\xc4\xb1r\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1r, tedaviye ihtiya\xc3\xa7 duyar m\xc4\xb1?\\n\xe2\x97\xbe Bu pandemide bizi en \xc3\xa7ok neler korkutup kayg\xc4\xb1land\xc4\xb1r\xc4\xb1yor, ba\xc5\x9fka ne tur duygulara sebep oluyor?\\n\xe2\x97\xbe Toplumun hangi kesimi bu pandemide ruhsal a\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1dan daha fazla etkilenme riski ta\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1yor, depresyon ve anksiyete rahats\xc4\xb1zl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1 olanlar bu s\xc3\xbcre\xc3\xa7ten nas\xc4\xb1l etkilenir?\\n\xe2\x97\xbe Salg\xc4\xb1n esnas\xc4\xb1nda yada sonras\xc4\xb1nda ruhsal a\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1dan profesyonel deste\xc4\x9fe ihtiya\xc3\xa7 duyan ki\xc5\x9filerin say\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1 artar m\xc4\xb1, bu konuda gereksiz olarak doktara gidenlerin say\xc4\xb1s\xc4\xb1nda art\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f olur mu?\\n\xe2\x97\xbe Bu korkuyla nas\xc4\xb1l ba\xc5\x9fa \xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1kaca\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1z?\\n\xe2\x97\xbe Ellerimi \xc3\xa7ok s\xc4\xb1k y\xc4\xb1kamak opsesif kompulsif rahats\xc4\xb1zl\xc4\xb1klar\xc4\xb1 tetikler mi? Baz\xc4\xb1 rahats\xc4\xb1zl\xc4\xb1k belirtileri ya\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1yorum fakat ge\xc3\xa7iyorlar, hastal\xc4\xb1k hastas\xc4\xb1 m\xc4\xb1 oldum, insanlar\xc4\xb1n hasta oldu\xc4\x9fundan \xc5\x9f\xc3\xbcphelenip uzak duruyorum paranoyak m\xc4\xb1 oldum?\\n\xe2\x97\xbe Bu konuda \xc3\xa7ocuklara yakla\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1mlarda nelere dikkat etmeliyiz?\\n\\n\xc4\xb0\xc3\xa7indekiler: \\n00:00 Giri\xc5\x9f\\n01:33 Dr. Samuray \xc3\x96zdemir\'i tan\xc4\xb1yal\xc4\xb1m\\n02:02 Psikoterapiler\\n04:22 Psikolog ile psikiyatrist fark\xc4\xb1\\n15:15 Covid-19 d\xc3\xb6nemi bir ruhsal travma s\xc3\xbcreci olarak kabul edilebilir mi?\\n17:27 Salg\xc4\xb1n d\xc3\xb6neminde verdi\xc4\x9fimiz tepkiler ne zaman normalden \xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1k\xc4\xb1p psikolojik bozukluk say\xc4\xb1l\xc4\xb1r? (Adaptive fear, non-adaptive fear)\\n24:44 \xc4\xb0\xc5\x9flevsellik (Functionality)\\n30:04 E-terapi, online terapi\\n31:24 Pandemide bilgi ve kayg\xc4\xb1 y\xc3\xb6netimi\\n38:33 T\xc3\xbcrkiye Psikiyatri Derne\xc4\x9fi (psikiyatri.org.tr)\\n40:17 Belirsizlik, rutinin bozulmas\xc4\xb1, ekonomik boyut, anksiyete\\n43:33 ** Sa\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1k \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fanlar\xc4\xb1na te\xc5\x9fekk\xc3\xbcrler **\\n44:53 Pandemi s\xc3\xbcrecini olumlu k\xc4\xb1labilecek f\xc4\xb1rsatlar\\n50:33 Ya\xc5\x9fad\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1z s\xc3\xbcre\xc3\xa7 ba\xc5\x9fka ne gibi sorunlara sebep olabilir?\\n01:01:54 Psikopatl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1n \xc3\xb6zg\xc3\xbcrle\xc5\x9fmesi\\n01:03:56 Sa\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1k \xc3\xa7al\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fan\xc4\xb1na \xc5\x9fiddet, \xc5\x9fiddetin korkuya d\xc3\xb6n\xc3\xbc\xc5\x9fmesi, sa\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1k\xc3\xa7\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n t\xc3\xbckenmi\xc5\x9fli\xc4\x9fi\\n01:08:47 Depresyon\\n01:10:39 Tedbirler, \xc3\xb6neriler\\n01:15:41 \\"Ellerimi \xc3\xa7ok y\xc4\xb1k\xc4\xb1yorum, obsesif-komp\xc3\xbclsif olur muyum?\\"\\n01:16:43 \\"S\xc3\xbcrekli vir\xc3\xbcs bula\xc5\x9fm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9f gibi belirtiler ya\xc5\x9f\xc4\xb1yorum, acaba korona m\xc4\xb1 oldum?\\"\\n01:22:29 Salg\xc4\xb1n durumunu \xc3\xa7ocuklara nas\xc4\xb1l anlatabiliriz?\\n01:26:08 Soru-Cevap\\n01:33:27 Dr. Samuray \xc3\x96zdemir\'den \\"Korku Salg\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1!\\" tweet zinciri\\n01:37:10 Yassu ile tan\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9fal\xc4\xb1m :)"

title: Bir Salgının Anatomisi | Prof. Dr. Hasan Güçlü
description: Prof. Dr Hasan G\xc3\x9c\xc3\x87L\xc3\x9c ile \\"Bir Salg\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n Anatomisi\\" ba\xc5\x9fl\xc4\xb1kl\xc4\xb1 YouTube canl\xc4\xb1 yay\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1zda Hasan G\xc3\xbc\xc3\xa7l\xc3\xbc salg\xc4\xb1nlar\xc4\xb1n yay\xc4\xb1lma istatistiklerini anlatt\xc4\xb1 ve izleyicilerimizin akl\xc4\xb1m\xc4\xb1za tak\xc4\xb1lan sorular\xc4\xb1 cevaplad\xc4\xb1.\\n\\nYay\xc4\xb1nda COVID-19 salg\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 \xc3\xb6zelinde T\xc3\xbcrkiye ve Avrupa\'da salg\xc4\xb1n hastal\xc4\xb1klar\xc4\xb1n yay\xc4\xb1lmas\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n modellenmesi nas\xc4\xb1l ger\xc3\xa7ekle\xc5\x9ftiriliyor? Salg\xc4\xb1n modellemenin \xc3\xb6nemi nedir? \xc3\x9clkemizde salg\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1n yay\xc4\xb1lma h\xc4\xb1z\xc4\xb1 ile ilgili grafikler bizlere ne ifade ediyor? \xc4\xb0statistiklere g\xc3\xb6re gerekli \xc3\xb6nlemler al\xc4\xb1nmazsa salg\xc4\xb1ndan ne kadar insan etkilenecek? \\n\\nProf. Dr. Hasan G\xc3\x9c\xc3\x87L\xc3\x9c  lisans ve y\xc3\xbcksek lisans e\xc4\x9fitimini ODT\xc3\x9c Fizik B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbc\'nde tamamlad\xc4\xb1ktan sonra  Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, Fen Bilimleri Enstit\xc3\xbcs\xc3\xbc, ABD\'de doktoras\xc4\xb1n\xc4\xb1 tamamlam\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. \\n\\nSay\xc4\xb1n G\xc3\x9c\xc3\x87L\xc3\x9c, Sa\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1k Bilimleri, T\xc4\xb1p, Temel T\xc4\xb1p Bilimleri, Biyoistatistik ve T\xc4\xb1p Bili\xc5\x9fimi, Dahili T\xc4\xb1p Bilimleri, Halk Sa\xc4\x9fl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1, Epidemiyoloji alanlar\xc4\xb1nda \xc3\xa7e\xc5\x9fitli ara\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1rmalar yapm\xc4\xb1\xc5\x9ft\xc4\xb1r. Hala \xc4\xb0stanbul Medeniyet \xc3\x9cniversitesi, M\xc3\xbchendislik ve Do\xc4\x9fa Bilimleri Fak\xc3\xbcltesi, \xc4\xb0statistik B\xc3\xb6l\xc3\xbcm\xc3\xbc Anabilim/Bilim Dal\xc4\xb1 Ba\xc5\x9fkanl\xc4\xb1\xc4\x9f\xc4\xb1na devam etmektedir.  2015\'ten beri Biyoistatistik lisans dersleri vermektedir.\\n\\nSunucu \xe2\x96\xba Burak \xc3\x87ankaya\\nKonuk \xe2\x96\xba Prof. Dr. Hasan G\xc3\xbc\xc3\xa7l\xc3\xbc"
